original: intros x y [H1 [r [H2 H3]]]. destruct H1 as [H4 H5]. apply is_ratp_intro. - apply is_rat_intro. + apply relp_rat in H2 as [pq [H6 [H7 [H8 [H9 H10]]]]]. destruct pq as [p q]. split; [assumption |]. apply frac_intro; auto. + apply relp_rat in H2 as [pq [H6 [H7 [H8 _]]]]. apply Z.trichotomy in H8 as [H8 | [H8 | H8]]; [lia | contradiction | lia]. - apply is_rat_intro. + apply relp_rat in H3 as [pq [H6 [H7 [H8 [H9 H10]]]]]. destruct pq as [p q]. split; [assumption |]. apply frac_intro; auto. + apply relp_rat in H3 as [pq [H6 [H7 [H8 _]]]]. apply Z.trichotomy in H8 as [H8 | [H8 | H8]]; [lia | contradiction | lia].
